channel.title: Join on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi
channel.description: Recent content in Join on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi

item.title: Internship
item.description: Hello, Thank you for your interest in pursuing an internship in the HydroSense Lab of IIT Delhi. Please read this carefully. Who we are A fledgling lab with the MISSION of developing innovative solutions for water, weather, and climate change issues at local to global scales. We want to better understand various aspects of the water cycle. Our GOAL right now is to develop monitoring and forecasting systems for floods and landslides using physical modeling and machine learning.
